creator: fink@fasihi.net

text:
Tomcat 7.0.37 is more strict in processing its SSL configuration, thanks to fixing bug 54406.

It is very likely that your configuration is incorrect. You should ask on the users mailing list (not the dev one) and maybe people there would be able to help you.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com

text: Yes, this looks like a ciphers mis-match. Resolving as invalid until proved otherwise (at which point feel free to re-open this and provided the necessary information to re-roduce).
creator: markt@apache.org

text:
This is caused by bug 54690 which removed support for SSLv2Hello.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 54690 ***
creator: markt@apache.org
